structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.catch_line: Conditions of bail -- Liability of facility releasing defendant.

text.section: The jail or facility authorized by county or city ordinance agreeing to care for the person releasing the defendant shall be considered as acting in good faith and shall not be liable for subsequent acts of the defendant upon release.

law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 5, effective July 1, 1986.
